title: Mercury Transit in the 4th House for Virgo Ascendant
summary: When Mercury transits your 4th house, mental focus shifts toward home, family, property, and emotional foundations. Conversations within the family increase, and decisions related to residence, vehicles, or real estate come to the forefront. You prefer rational discussion over emotional reactions at home. This transit supports planning renovations, paperwork, and learning from home, but overthinking domestic matters can disturb inner peace. Balance comes from clear communication, practical decisions, and maintaining emotional sensitivity alongside logic.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Need to mentally organize home life

sections.heading: Career & Work
points: Real estate or admin tasks supported
Avoid mixing family stress with work

closing: This Mercury transit refines thinking around home and inner security. Clear dialogue and balanced sensitivity maintain peace.
